title: Touch of Mischief
description: A Halloween Short StoryWith Homecoming and everything else that’s been going on in their world, everyone is on edge. But what better time to take in a few Halloween traditions like watching scary movies and carving pumpkins? Maybe kissing can be a new Halloween tradition now that Sang has joined the crew…Follow Sang and Kota, Victor, Silas, Nathan, Gabriel, Luke and North in this short slice of life story leading up to the homecoming dance.The Academy, Eerily SpookyWarning – if you haven’t yet read House of Korba, this story will give away mild spoilers – read at your own peril!
author: C.L. Stone
